Html:
Does FileGenerator support command line options?Â  It would be nice if it can be used in a script, eg.

Reflector.exe /Run:FileGenerator.dll /Assembly:abc.dll /OutputDir:c:\src /CreateSubdirectories

Thank you for sharing your cool program!

First, sorry for the really late response to this! I never noticed it until now :(

That's a good idea, but I'm not sure if Reflector will pass command-line args like this to an add-in. I'll see what I can find...

Regards,
Jason
